definition: School of Principle/Neo-Confucian Rationalistic School (from Song to mid-Qing times, c. 1000-1750, typified by the teachings of Cheng Hao 程顥|程颢[Cheng2 Hao4], Cheng Yi 程頤|程颐[Cheng2 Yi2] and Zhu Xi 朱熹[Zhu1 xi1])
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
scholar of the rationalist school of Neo-Confucianism 理學|理学[Li3 xue2]

sentences.english: This is the website for Department of Psychology, Memorial University of Newfoundland .
sentences.chinese: 這是紐芬蘭紀念大學心理學系的網站。

sentences.english: IN 1887 physicists were feeling pretty smug about their subject.
sentences.chinese: 1887年物理學家們對自己的學科都頗爲自鳴得意。

sentences.english: Pharmacologist is seriously studying the hypersusceptibility reaction of this medicine.
sentences.chinese: 藥理學家們正在認真研究這種藥的過敏反應。

sentences.english: Promoted to Year 2 of Higher Diploma in Human Resource Management, Tsing Yi Campus.
sentences.chinese: 升讀青衣分校人力資源管理學高級文憑課程二年級。

sentences.english: Paralanguage , including body language, has been extensively studied in social psychology.
sentences.chinese: 包括身體語言，已被廣泛地研究社會心理學。

sentences.english: Location theory is one of basic parts of economic geography.
sentences.chinese: 區位理論是現代經濟地理學基本理論的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The theory of constructionism contributes to the psychology teaching.
sentences.chinese: 建構主義理論對於心理學教學改革有着重要的啓示。

sentences.english: One of the Meccas for the leading physicists of that time was in Gottingen.
sentences.chinese: 那個時候引導物理學家的麥加聖地之一，是哥廷根。

sentences.english: The drug concentration of Zhi Gancao Decoction contained serum was examined by serologic pharmacological test.
sentences.chinese: 血清藥理學法確定血清中炙甘草湯含藥濃度。

sentences.english: Psychopathological classifications, which emphasize the mother-child relationships, are essential reference marks.
sentences.chinese: 心理病理學分類，着重於母子關係是必要的參考標準。

sentences.english: Constructivism is a revolution of contemporary educational psychology.
sentences.chinese: 建構主義是當代教育心理學的一場革命。

sentences.english: Quantum theory is a branch of physics that deals with very small particles.
sentences.chinese: 量子論是一門研究微粒子的物理學。

sentences.english: Well,in the context of a psychology course, it's anything but trivial that change is possible.
sentences.chinese: 在心理學上，改變是有可能的，這點十分重要。

sentences.english: But essentially research that falls under or within the field of positive psychology.
sentences.chinese: 但本質上屬於積極心理學範疇。

sentences.english: Psychologists could also identify the key ages that best allow for the memorization of classical texts.
sentences.chinese: 心理學家也可以幫助確定最適於記憶經典文本的年齡。

definition: scholar of the rationalist school of Neo-Confucianism 理學|理学[Li3 xue2]
School of Mind/Neo-Confucian Idealistic School (from Song to mid-Qing times, c. 1000-1750, typified by the teachings of Wang Yangming 王陽明|王阳明[Wang2 Yang2 ming2])
